examples.text: I want to make sure that a payment was credited to my account. can you verify that?
I'd like to check the status of a bill I paid as it has not been credited to my account.
Indicate payment for the purchase of my device six months ago
My bill says I didn't make a payment last month, but I did, can you look into this please?
Wanted to make sure my payment was received.
When was this specific payment made?
Can I get a payment record for these whole year?
I want payment information by a device two months ago
I paid my bill but got sent an overdue notice, my bank statement shows it went through so why does it say its overdue?
I need some details about my last month payment.
I already pay that in this month
Can you tell me if I paid my bill with my credit card?
Does the payment for july is already done?
How do I review my payments?
How can I know my payment went through?

intents.description: Inquire about payments made in the past.

examples.text: Hi, can I pay for the service by paypal?
What kind of payments are accepted?
What did I pay for credit card?
Is there a chance I can pay with cash upon delivery?
Morning, can you tell me by what methods I can settle my monthly bill?

intents.description: Manage the method of payment for a bill.

examples.text: Can I get a refund on the activation fee?
Can I get a refund when my internet was out for 6 hours?
Can I get my last month refunded due to the contract cancelation?
Can I just have a full refund?
Do I get a refund if I paid too much?
I am unfairly charged. am I going to be refunded?
I paid my bill twice last month. can you refund my last payment?
I want a refund on the previous purchase I made.
I was charged for services that I don't subscribe to. how can I go about getting a refund
I was overcharged on my last bill, I need that refunded.
I would like a refund for the service outage last month please.
If I cancel some services which have been prepaid, can I receive a refund for part of what has already been paid? what is your refund policy?
Is it possible to refund the latest payment that I made?
My credit card was double charged for my last bill. how do I get the extra charge refunded to it?
My service was interrupted for 5 days. I would like a refund based on the time that the service was unavailable.
Who do I have to speak to get a refund on one of my payments?

intents.description: Request a refund for a payment.
